name: DiscoverMe
0:
”Alexa, open discover me”
”Alexa, tell discover me to search for tom cruise movies”
”Alexa, ask discover me to find fast and furious”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: discover me
des:
Ask for search query (it could be name of movie, actor, director, quote or keywords) and get recommendation movies in results.
Skill is optimized best to work with dedicated web interface.

Here are a few short utterance samples to activate this skill:
* To open skill, just say: Alexa, open/load discover me
* To run search query, just say: Alexa, ask/tell discover me to search for drama movies
* To get search query results, just say: Alexa, ask/tell discover me to get chris hemsworth movies
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
